bomberman.game.logic

Class GameMultiplayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • bomberman.game.logic.GameMultiplayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GameMultiplayer
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class to represent multiplayer game. Whenever is instantiated, the game runs on a thread.
    Author:
    thebomberman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Method to start game.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Method to stop game. Used only when game is not needed.

      • run

        public void run()
        Method used when game starts. Contains the main game loop in which the game is updated and rendered. Rendering is used to render pixels to the screen. This is used every loop iteration. Update is used to maintain the game velocity independent from the pc used. The game updates it's state ate a constant frequency. (60 updates per second).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • update

        public void update()
        Method to update the game elements.
